package.static-class:
util 4.0.1 Hemi framework utilities
getIsRequested Object to test whether it has been requested. Bit indicating whether the control is currently requested for display. Returns a bit indicating whether or not the control is requested for display.
request Control that is making the request. Target node for which the control is being requested. Container node used by the control for display. Associates a control with a node, and keeps track of the request status.
endRequest Control that is making the request. Container node used by the control for display. Hides the WideSelectInstance control if requested.
Relying on consistency that {hemi-object}.objects.c is the holder for the container object Otherwise use .getContainer()
if(_s.is_paging) t.clearItems();
alignControl Control to be aligned. Target node for which the control is being aligned. Container node used by the control for display. Bit indicating whether the control is currently requested for display. Returns a bit indicating whether or not the control is requested for display.
